data.Name: Colorado Is For Lovers
data.Description: General Admission Only SEATING: No chairs are provided, this show is all lawn seating. We recommend bringing your own blankets or chairs (preferably low lawn chairs). PARKING: All cars enter the park on the south side of Ruby Hill Park on Jewell Avenue. Follow signs and the flaggers who will direct you on the best place to park. If you require ADA parking, please tell the attendant upon entering and they will direct you to these spaces. ADA parking is located right outside of the main entrance. Parking on the park grass is illegal and violators will be ticketed or towed. ENTRY: General Admission guests will enter via the gate on the grass located near the main entrance. RULES: Lawn chairs, picnic blankets, food (with plastic utensils), empty water bottles and factory sealed beverages allowed. Alcohol, marijuana, glass and weapons are strictly prohibited. WEATHER: All shows are rain or shine. Please check the forecast before leaving and pack appropriately for the weather.
